contributions: Company: Coordinated all phases of the graphic design and print production processes for large format signage to print collateral ephemera as well as web banners and ads
Company: Performed routine cleaning and preventative maintenance on graphics equipment and coordinated with maintenance and vendor for repair
Company: Assisted in the creation and implementation of department procedures
Company: Provided technical support and graphics procedures training to Account Specialists and Customer Service Representatives as required
Company: Utilized personal computer graphics software to generate electronic artwork and revised existing artwork to meet customer specifications
Company: Created materials in alignment with the client’s brand and style requirements
Company: Created artwork and plate-ready negatives from customer-supplied artwork and concepts
Company: Produced illustrations for documents associated with scientific and engineering activities
Company: Collaborated with the communication team and client partners to develop and launch brands, logos, images and style guides
Company: Completed projects by coordinating with outside agencies, art services, printers, etc.
Company: Established positive working relationships with representatives of community organizations, state/local agencies and associations, city management and staff, and the public

aggregation.search_summary: A total of 9 unique jobs matched the search criteria after deduplication. Four roles closely matched the candidate's preferred role and location, with moderate relevance due to experience gaps or location outside preferred cities. One job strongly matched location and skills but did not match the managerial role or salary expectations. Several others were aspirational due to location or experience requirements.
